mapper.select: select * from(select rownum rn, tt.*from(select * from refundrequest where status like '%'||#{status}||'%' and startdate between #{startDate} and to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1 order by serial desc)tt) where rn between ${startNum} and ${endNum}
select count(*) from refundrequest where status like '%'||#{status}||'%' and startdate between #{startDate} and to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1 order by serial desc
mapper.update: update refundrequest set enddate = sysdate, STATUS = '처리완료' where serial=#{itemSerial}
update refundrequest set enddate = sysdate, status = '처리완료' where serial in #{serial}
mapper.select: select count(*) from refundrequest join buylist using(serial) where id=#{id}
select count(*) from refundrequest join buylist using(serial) where id=#{id} and type=#{type}
